thread.title: NRA: Britain's gun controls don't deter violence

title: NRA: Britain's gun controls don't deter violence
text:
NRA: Britain's gun controls don't deter violence 2:31pm EDT - 01:58 
The largest U.S. gun lobby says London's murder rate, which has been higher than New York's for the past couple of months, proves tough gun laws don't deter violent crime. That argument won't sway many Britons. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The largest U.S. gun lobby says London's murder rate, which has been higher than New York's for the past couple of months, proves tough gun laws don't deter violent crime.
